item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Vivek. I am a developer based out of Kerala, India. Addicted to computers from a young age, I have been developing small micro-controller based programs to complex enterprise applications for some time now. I see technology as an “enabler” & was marvelled by the progress, we as a species, abled to achieve using it. In the last 5 years, I have co-created two startups, Codeister Technologies & Spoon.
